about_the_game:
We will follow this story from the point of view of the couple Eros and Venus. We will follow their materialistic and carnal desires as they delight in pleasures in our real world. We previously followed Lenny's adventures as he struggles to piece together the puzzle of his fragmented memory. His destiny was linked to the mysterious and mythical "Garden of Earthly Delights". This erotic garden goes beyond its desert borders.
Today we know that this paradise is commanded by Priapella and Priapus. However, centuries ago another couple was responsible for all this wonder of explicit sex and pleasure: Venus and Eros.
Of course, they got tired of the place pretty quickly, handing over control to its main creator known as Suadella. Eros and Venus have much more ambitious plans. The divine appeal of their erotic lives does not hold back the pleasure they so cherish. Now, they want to expand their powers in our contemporary world, distributing explicit sex to anyone who can pay a lot of money.
They are ambitious, profane, nymphomaniacs and materialists. Here, we will learn about their story in our carnal world, far from the pornographic mysticism of the garden of Earthly Delights.





This DLC will expand the universe of the original Visual Novel, Gardens of Earthly Delights.
The game continues as a Visual Novel. However, let's explore the events that occurred after Lenny and Melody's meeting with the couple Priapus and Priapella within this fantastic realm of erotic fantasy.
Additionally, there are two important characters that need to be introduced. They are Himeros and Suadella.
Himeros was imprisoned by Eros because of something very serious he did. The Lenny case reveals that this prison no longer has any effect and he now seeks revenge against his brother.
Suadella once commanded the Gardens of Earthly Delights, and will seize this opportunity to regain what she lost. Lenny and Melody will be in the middle of this conflict as catalysts for the plot.





This is a traditional visual novel with choice options buttons and mouse-click navigation.
Click on the text or in the "colored leaf" to advance. The game has a menu located at the top left. When clicking on the orange icon with four black stripes, a submenu will appear with options to control sound, go back to the beginning, and save the dialogs.
On the game's home screen (Main Menu), you should go to the PLAY menu. Three language options will appear. Each of them is represented by one of the characters.
Just click on the character corresponding to the language of your choice to start the game. English, Spanish, Portuguese.

IMPORTANT!
This dialogue is AVAILABLE in ENGLISH, PORTUGUESE, AND SPANISH.

content_descriptors.notes:
This visual novel contains explicit sex scenes. Characters are naked for most of the game. There are masturbation scenes, explicit sex images, and animations. The entire story of this game uses sexual terms and expressions.
ALL characters are over 21 years old.

name: Sperme d’Éros: Garden of Earthly Delights
short_description: This DLC will expand the universe of the original Visual Novel, Gardens of Earthly Delights. We will follow this story from the point of view of the couple Eros and Venus. We will follow their materialistic and carnal desires as they delight in pleasures in our real world.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
